name: The DTDeconstructor
short_description: The DTDeconstructor is a Java/Swing based tool to be used in the creation of DTD documents.  It uses an intuitive Swing based GUI, and allows the generation of DTD documents from scratch, facilitating a proper workflow in the generation of XML documents.
